hero.title: Create Stunning Videos with Seedance 2.0
hero.subtitle: Transform text and images into cinematic-quality videos in seconds. Powered by advanced AI with unmatched motion control, consistency, and resolution.

features.title: Key Features of Seedance 2.0
features.subtitle: Powerful capabilities that make this the ultimate AI video generation platform.

items.title: Multi Shot Storytelling
items.description: Generate cohesive multi shot videos with seamless transitions. Maintains consistent characters and visual style across all scene changes.

items.title: 2K Resolution Quality
items.description: Delivers up to 2K cinematic resolution with multiple aspect ratios. Create professional videos optimized for any platform.

items.title: Audio to Video Generation
items.description: Upload your own audio tracks and get matching visuals instantly. Seedance 2.0 provides millisecond accurate lip sync and rhythm alignment.

items.title: Image to Video Quality
items.description: Transform photos into dynamic videos with superior consistency. Maintains facial features and visual style perfectly throughout.

items.title: Natural Motion Synthesis
items.description: Creates fluid movements with exceptional physical realism. From subtle expressions to intense action sequences with perfect stability.

items.title: Versatile Style Control
items.description: Supports photorealistic, anime, stop motion, and custom artistic styles. Seedance 2.0 responds precisely to any creative direction.

comparison.title: Seedance 2.0 vs Other AI Video Generators

items.title: Game & Concept Art

items.description: Elevate corporate presentations with dynamic video content that captures audience attention.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Seedance 2.0 AI video generation.

items.question: What is Seedance 2.0 and how does it work?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 is an advanced AI video generation platform that transforms text prompts and images into high-quality videos. It uses a state-of-the-art diffusion model trained on diverse video data to produce cinematic-quality output with precise motion control and visual consistency.

items.question: How does Seedance 2.0 compare to Sora and Kling?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 offers faster generation speeds (~30s vs 90-120s), superior character consistency across scenes, and more granular editing controls. While each platform has strengths, Seedance 2.0 provides the best balance of speed, quality, and creative control.

items.question: Is Seedance 2.0 free to use?
items.answer: Yes, Seedance 2.0 offers a generous free tier that includes daily credits for video generation. Premium plans are available for higher volume usage, priority processing, and advanced features like API access.

items.question: What video formats and resolutions are supported?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 generates videos up to 1080p resolution in MP4 format. You can choose from multiple aspect ratios including 16:9, 9:16, 1:1, and 4:3 to suit different platforms and use cases.

items.question: Can I use Seedance 2.0 videos for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, all videos generated with Seedance 2.0 can be used for commercial purposes. You retain full rights to your generated content, making it ideal for marketing, advertising, and professional creative projects.
